title: Google explains why your Pixel wonâ€™t get the Android 13 beta right after you sign up
content:
Since March, Google has been maintaining two active channels of beta updates for its smartphone users. The Pixel Feature Drops are now part of the Quarterly Platform Release (QPR) branch, while the upcoming major Android revision has got its own track. In accordance with the new strategy, the company delivered Android 12 QPR3 Beta 2

The post Google explains why your Pixel won’t get the Android 13 beta right after you sign up appeared first on XDA.
description: Wonder why there's no Android 13 or 12 QPR3 beta OTA available immediately after enrolling your Pixel device? Here's Google's explanation.
